overview:
Clipping Path Adroit-an offshore Outsourcing Company, We are expert in any kind of Image editing services.

Clipping Path Adroit is dedicated to serve clients worldwide in Clipping Path, Photoshop Masking, Image Retouching, Manipulation, Image Editing, Shadow Creating, and raster to vector image. Services by the highly skilled graphic professionals and also have lots years of professional understanding into these areas and the number of the professionals are educated from the Graphic Art Institute, the most excellent institute on graphics design into Bangladesh which educates graphic design only.Our service cost lower than other countries. Taking that maximum advantage of low labor cost region, we are able to provide much lower prices than our competitors while still maintaining the top quality work and service.

We are specialized in:

Clipping Path Drop Shadow Photoshop Masking Reflection shadow Image Manipulation Color Correction Photoshop Retouching Background Change Image Editing Object Removing Photo Enhancement Image Resizing / website image optimisation Image Stitching Raster to Vector Image to any other photo treatment services
